tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_pipeline (
    deal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    deal_name VARCHAR(50),
    deal_stage VARCHAR(20),
    expected_close_date DATE,
    deal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_pipeline (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
lead_id INT,
sales_stage VARCHAR,
sales_value FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE ROI_analysis (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR,
    campaign_cost DECIMAL,
    revenue_generated DECIMAL,
    ROI DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales_pipeline (
    deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    deal_name VARCHAR(255),
    deal_stage VARCHAR(50),
    deal_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    deal_close_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ROI_data (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    revenue GENERATED ALWAYS AS (campaign_revenue - campaign_cost) STORED,
    campaign_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE analyst_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE,
    lead_conversion_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
    sales_pipeline_analysis TEXT,
    ROI_analysis TEXT
);
